General.Name: Zhongyan Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongyan Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a geotechnical technology company in China. It offers geotechnical engineering and environmental restoration services, as well as rock and soil stabilizer materials, and new pipe pile materials. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Jianguo  Liu
1.Title: Director, Deputy Gen. Mang. and Chief Engineer
